as the

the Square bookstore which has done as

Lifestyles is it left right I don't

strongly non-corporate
piece to it and that is something to be
treasured at this time in our history
because so much has been corporatized
and if you ask people left or right
there's an overwhelming sense that
corporate power has become too dominant
so seeking alternatives to that is also
at the heart and soul of this
book
